name: Hyatt Category 1-4 Hotels
description: Hyatt's lower category hotels offer exceptional value, especially in destinations like Tokyo, Paris, and various US cities

name: ANA Partner Business Class
description: Book business class on Star Alliance partners using ANA miles. US to Europe roundtrip for 88,000 miles

name: ANA First Class via Virgin Atlantic
description: Book ANA First Class using Virgin Atlantic miles. US to Japan roundtrip for 120,000 miles

name: Avios Short-Haul Flights
description: British Airways Avios are excellent for short-haul flights under 650 miles. One-way from 7,500 Avios

name: Flying Blue Promo Awards
description: Air France/KLM offers monthly promo awards with 25-50% off. Business class to Europe from 53,000 miles

name: Aeroplan Mini Round-the-World
description: Build complex itineraries with up to 16 segments. Business class mini-RTW for ~200,000 miles

name: Singapore Airlines Business Class
description: Book SQ's excellent business class product. US to Singapore from 92,000 miles one-way

name: United Excursionist Perk
description: Get a free one-way flight in the same region when booking roundtrip. Adds significant value to any booking

name: Hyatt All-Inclusive Resorts
description: Use Hyatt points at Ziva/Zilara all-inclusive resorts. Standard rooms from 20,000-25,000 points/night

name: Southwest Companion Pass
description: Earn 135,000 points in a year to get a companion flying free for up to 2 years
